Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: AI is less restrictive in the feedback that can be provided, whereas the lecturers have to give general feedback and can't really help with the assignments.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: When I received feedback from lecturers constantly it made me feel confident in the assessments, however I sometimes needed specific questions to help with the understanding of the assignment.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: You can really get detailed answers from chatgpt, but they may not have a complete understanding of the requirements, or wrong facts.
